name: XAMPWEB Elementor Slider
author: Mohidul Islam

sections.description:
XAMPWEB Elementor Slider is a powerful and user-friendly Elementor Slider Extention that enables you to create stunning sliders with ease. Its intuitive interface lets you tell stories through your sliders without any need for coding. With full responsiveness and SEO optimization, this plugin works seamlessly with any WordPress Elementor Base theme, delivering results that are both visually appealing and technically sound. Get started today and bring your website to the next level with XAMPWEB Elementor Slider.

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/xampweb-elementor-slider/

  • About Author

Video Tutorial

Coming Soon

⚡ You can changes settings

  • No setup needed.
  • Unlimited colors.
  • Customize Button

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.5 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

UPDATING

Automatic updates should work seamlessly. We always suggest you backup your website before any automated update to avoid unforeseen problems.
sections.faq:
Is XAMPWEB Elementor Slider free plugin?

Yes, Its free WordPress Plugin.

Can I customize this?

Yes, Its easy to customize.
